question: Please list the names of the production company of the movie "Four Rooms".
query: SELECT T1.company_name FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T3.title = 'Four Rooms'

question: How many production companies does the movie "Four Rooms" have?
query: SELECT COUNT(CNAME) FROM ( SELECT T1.company_name AS CNAME FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T3.title = 'Four Rooms' )

question: Please list the titles of all the movie produced by production company "Universal Pictures".
query: SELECT T3.title FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Universal Pictures'

question: What is the title of the latest released movie produced by production company "Universal Pictures"?
query: SELECT T3.title FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Universal Pictures' ORDER BY T3.release_date DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the name of the director of photography of the movie "Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End"?
query: SELECT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title LIKE 'Pirates of the Caribbean: At World%s End' AND T2.job = 'Director of Photography'

question: What was the job of Dariusz Wolski in the movie "Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End"?
query: SELECT T2.job FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title LIKE 'Pirates of the Caribbean: At World%s End' AND T3.person_name = 'Dariusz Wolski'

question: Please list the names of all the crew members of the movie "Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End".
query: SELECT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title LIKE 'Pirates of the Caribbean: At World%s End'

question: How many crew members worked as producer in the movie "Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End"?
query: SELECT COUNT(T3.person_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title LIKE 'Pirates of the Caribbean: At World%s End' AND T2.job = 'Producer'

question: Please list the names of all the producers in the movie "Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End".
query: SELECT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title LIKE 'Pirates of the Caribbean: At World%s End' AND T2.job = 'Producer'

question: In how many movie does Dariusz Wolski work as the director of photography?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.movie_id) FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T1.person_name = 'Dariusz Wolski' AND T2.job = 'Director of Photography'

question: Among the movie in which Dariusz Wolski works as the director of photography, what is the title of the one with the highest average vote?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Dariusz Wolski' AND T2.job = 'Director of Photography' ORDER BY T1.vote_average DESC LIMIT 1

question: When was the release date of the latest movie in which Dariusz Wolski worked as a crew member?
query: SELECT T1.release_date FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Dariusz Wolski' ORDER BY T1.release_date DESC LIMIT 1

question: Among the movie in which Dariusz Wolski works as the director of photography, what is the percentage of those movie whose vote average is over 5.0?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.vote_average > 5 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.vote_average) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Dariusz Wolski' AND T2.job = 'Director of Photography'

question: What is the average revenue of the movie in which Dariusz Wolski works as the director of photography?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(T1.revenue) AS REAL) / COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Dariusz Wolski' AND T2.job = 'Director of Photography'

question: Give the name of the movie with a revenue of 559852396.
query: SELECT title FROM movie WHERE revenue = 559852396

question: What was David Rubin's job in the movie "Days of Thunder"?
query: SELECT T2.job FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'David Rubin' AND T1.title = 'Days of Thunder'

question: How many movies were directed by Michael Bay?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.movie_id) FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T1.person_name = 'Michael Bay' AND T2.job = 'Director'

question: Show the total number of keywords of the movie "I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell".
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.keyword_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE T1.title = 'I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell'

question: For the movie "Land of the Dead", who is its director?
query: SELECT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title = 'Land of the Dead' AND T2.job = 'Director'

question: Tell the number of movies made by Paramount Animation.
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.movie_id) FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Paramount Animation'

question: How many female characters are there in the movie "Spider-Man 3"?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN gender AS T3 ON T2.gender_id = T3.gender_id WHERE T1.title = 'Spider-Man 3' AND T3.gender = 'Female'

question: Provide the most used keyword in the movies.
query: SELECT T1.keyword_name FROM keyword AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.keyword_id = T2.keyword_id GROUP BY T1.keyword_name ORDER BY COUNT(T1.keyword_name) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many producers does the movie "The Amityville Horror" have?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.person_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Amityville Horror' AND T2.job = 'Producer'

question: What is the production company of the movie "Crazy Heart"?
query: SELECT T1.company_name FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T3.title = 'Crazy Heart'

question: Give the number of movies with "saving the world" as the keyword.
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.movie_id) FROM keyword AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.keyword_id = T2.keyword_id WHERE keyword_name = 'saving the world'

question: For all the movies which were produced by Cruel and Unusual Films, which one has the most popularity?
query: SELECT T3.title FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Cruel and Unusual Films' ORDER BY T3.popularity DESC LIMIT 1

question: For the movie "Reign of Fire", which department was Marcia Ross in?
query: SELECT T4.department_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id INNER JOIN department AS T4 ON T2.department_id = T4.department_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Marcia Ross' AND T1.title = 'Reign of Fire'

question: Calculate the average budget of the movies directed by Jaume Collet-Serra.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(T1.budget) AS REAL) / COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Jaume Collet-Serra' AND T2.job = 'Director'

question: What is the percentage of male characters in the movie "Bride Wars"?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T3.gender = 'Male' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T3.gender) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN gender AS T3 ON T2.gender_id = T3.gender_id WHERE T1.title = 'Bride Wars'

question: What is the title of the movie that was made with the most money and resources?
query: SELECT title FROM movie ORDER BY budget DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many movies have made at least 1 Billion at the box office?
query: SELECT COUNT(movie_id) FROM movie WHERE revenue > 1000000000

question: When was the first movie released?
query: SELECT MIN(release_date) FROM movie WHERE movie_status = 'Released'

question: How many crew are named John Young?
query: SELECT COUNT(person_id) FROM person WHERE person_name = 'John Young'

question: Provide the title of the movie that is most-liked by a large number of people.
query: SELECT title FROM movie ORDER BY popularity DESC LIMIT 1

question: Who is the person associated with the crew id 1325273?
query: SELECT person_name FROM person WHERE person_id = 1325273

question: What is the name of the production company that made the most movies?
query: SELECT T1.company_name FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id GROUP BY T1.company_id ORDER BY COUNT(T2.movie_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Who played Captain Jack Sparrow in all of the Pirates of the Caribbean movies?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T2.character_name = 'Captain Jack Sparrow' AND T1.title LIKE 'Pirates of the Caribbean%'

question: What is Walt Disney Pictures' most popular movie?
query: SELECT T3.title FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Walt Disney Pictures' ORDER BY T3.popularity DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many movies did Universal Studios release?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.movie_id) FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Universal Studios'

question: Which production company produced the movie that made the most money at the box office?
query: SELECT T1.company_name FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id GROUP BY T1.company_id ORDER BY SUM(T3.revenue) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many female crews are in the movie "Mr. Smith Goes to Washington"?
query: SELECT COUNT(T3.gender) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN gender AS T3 ON T2.gender_id = T3.gender_id WHERE T1.title = 'Mr. Smith Goes to Washington' AND T3.gender = 'Female'

question: List the names of the production companies that made at least 200 movies.
query: SELECT T1.company_name FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id GROUP BY T1.company_id HAVING COUNT(T2.movie_id) > 200

question: How many movies did Harrison Ford appear in total?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.movie_id) FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T1.person_name = 'Harrison Ford'

question: What is the title of Jamie Foxx's most recent movie?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Jamie Foxx' ORDER BY T1.release_date DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many movies released in 1995 did Quentin Tarantino appear in?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Quentin Tarantino' AND CAST(STRFTIME('%Y', T1.release_date) AS INT) = 1995

question: What is the title of the first crime movie ever released?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T3.genre_name = 'Crime' ORDER BY T1.release_date LIMIT 1

question: How many horror movies are there?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie_genres AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.genre_id WHERE T2.genre_name = 'Horror'

question: List the person IDs of the second film editors in Movie No. 12.
query: SELECT person_id FROM movie_crew WHERE movie_id = 12 AND job = 'Second Film Editor'

question: How many animators does Movie No. 129 have?
query: SELECT COUNT(movie_id) FROM movie_crew WHERE movie_id = 129 AND job = 'Animation'

question: In Movie No. 19, how many people are there in Department No. 7? Please give me their job.
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT job) FROM movie_crew WHERE movie_id = 19 AND department_id = 7

question: Write the person ID and character name of casts between order numbers 1 and 10 in Movie No. 285.
query: SELECT person_id, character_name FROM movie_cast WHERE movie_id = 285 AND cast_order BETWEEN 1 AND 10

question: How many times did Bob Peterson appear in the movie credits?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.movie_id) FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T1.person_name = 'Bob Peterson'

question: Tally the movie ID and character name in the movie starring Jim Carrey.
query: SELECT T2.movie_id, T2.character_name FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T1.person_name = 'Jim Carrey'

question: Give the names of the female cast in Movie No. 1865.
query: SELECT T2.person_name FROM movie_cast AS T1 INNER JOIN person AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id INNER JOIN gender AS T3 ON T1.gender_id = T3.gender_id WHERE T1.movie_id = 1865 AND T3.gender = 'Female'

question: Write me the titles of the movies starring Jim Carrey.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Jim Carrey'

question: List the director's name of the movies released between 1/01/1916 and 12/31/1925.
query: SELECT T2.person_name FROM movie_cast AS T1 INNER JOIN person AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T1.movie_id = T3.movie_id INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T4 ON T1.movie_id = T4.movie_id WHERE T4.job = 'Director' AND T3.release_date BETWEEN '1916-01-01' AND '1925-12-31'

question: How many films released between 1/2/1990 and 12/30/2000 starred Uma Thurman?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Uma Thurman' AND T1.release_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'

question: Write the titles of horror films with a vote average of more than 7.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T3.genre_name = 'Horror' AND vote_average > 7

question: Give the genre and popularity of movies whose revenue is at least 120,000,000 between 2012 and 2015.
query: SELECT T3.genre_name, T1.popularity FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T1.revenue > 120000000 AND T1.release_date BETWEEN '2012-01-01' AND '2015-12-31'

question: How many Indian movies between 1/2/1990 and 12/30/2003 have revenue of more than 75,000,000 and popularity of no less than 20?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE T1.revenue > 75000000 AND T1.popularity >= 20 AND T1.release_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2003-12-31'

question: What is the title of the highest-budget film to date? Please include the revenue and name the country.
query: SELECT T1.title, T1.revenue, T3.COUNTry_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T3 ON T2.COUNTry_id = T3.COUNTry_id ORDER BY T1.budget DESC LIMIT 1

question: List the title of movies in Latin released between 1/01/1990 and 12/31/1995.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id WHERE T3.language_name = 'Latin' AND T1.release_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31'

question: What is the average revenue of American movies in 2006?
query: SELECT AVG(T1.revenue) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T3 ON T2.COUNTry_id = T3.COUNTry_id WHERE T3.COUNTry_name = 'United States of America' AND CAST(STRFTIME('%Y', T1.release_date) AS INT) = 2006

question: Calculate the 2016 gap between the average revenue for Indian and American films.
query: SELECT AVG(CASE WHEN T3.COUNTry_name = 'United States of America' THEN T1.revenue END) - AVG(CASE WHEN T3.COUNTry_name = 'India' THEN T1.revenue END) AS CALCULATE FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T3 ON T2.COUNTry_id = T3.COUNTry_id WHERE CAST(STRFTIME('%Y', T1.release_date) AS INT) = 2016

question: What is the percentage of romance films among films produced in India in 2015?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T4.genre_name = 'Romance' THEN T1.movie_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T3 ON T1.movie_id = T3.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T2.genre_id = T4.genre_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T5 ON T3.COUNTry_id = T5.COUNTry_id WHERE T5.COUNTry_name = 'India' AND T1.release_date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2015-12-31'

question: Which actor plays Optimus Prime?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.person_name FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T2.character_name = 'Optimus Prime (voice)'

question: What is the gender of the character 'USAF Master Sgt. Epps?'
query: SELECT T2.gender FROM movie_cast AS T1 INNER JOIN gender AS T2 ON T1.gender_id = T2.gender_id WHERE T1.character_name = 'USAF Master Sgt. Epps'

question: List all companies who worked in the movie 'Ultramarines: A Warhammer 40,000 Movie.'
query: SELECT T1.company_name FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T3.title = 'Ultramarines: A Warhammer 40,000 Movie'

question: Which movie did the company 'Radiant Film GmbH' work on?
query: SELECT T3.title FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Radiant Film GmbH'

question: What are the genres of Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow?
query: SELECT T3.genre_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T1.title = 'Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow'

question: Write all the keywords belonging to the movie 'Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow.'
query: SELECT T3.keyword_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN keyword AS T3 ON T2.keyword_id = T3.keyword_id WHERE T1.title = 'Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow'

question: The movie 'Gojira ni-sen mireniamu' is from which country?
query: SELECT T3.COUNTry_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T3 ON T2.COUNTry_id = T3.COUNTry_id WHERE T1.title = 'Gojira ni-sen mireniamu'

question: Which movie has the keyword 'extremis?'
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN keyword AS T3 ON T2.keyword_id = T3.keyword_id WHERE T3.keyword_name = 'extremis'

question: List 10 movie titles that were produced in France.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T3 ON T2.COUNTry_id = T3.COUNTry_id WHERE T3.COUNTry_name = 'France' LIMIT 10

question: Who is the director for the movie 'Transformers?'
query: SELECT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title = 'Transformers' AND T2.job = 'Director'

question: List 10 crews alongside their jobs who worked on the movie 'Mad Max: Fury Road.'
query: SELECT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title = 'Mad Max: Fury Road' LIMIT 10

question: What percentage of movies that came from Japan belong in the 'animation' genre?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T4.genre_name = 'Animation' THEN T1.movie_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T3 ON T1.movie_id = T3.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T2.genre_id = T4.genre_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T5 ON T3.COUNTry_id = T5.COUNTry_id WHERE T5.COUNTry_name = 'Japan'

question: What is the ratio between male and female cast members of the movie 'Iron Man?' Count how many have unspecified genders.
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T3.gender = 'Male' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN T3.gender = 'Female' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS RATIO , COUNT(CASE WHEN T3.gender = 'Unspecified' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS UNGENDERS FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN gender AS T3 ON T2.gender_id = T3.gender_id WHERE T1.title = 'Iron Man'

question: List down five movie titles that were released before 2000.
query: SELECT title FROM movie WHERE CAST(STRFTIME('%Y', release_date) AS INT) < 2000 LIMIT 5

question: What is the keyword ID of the movie with the title of "Sin City"?
query: SELECT T2.keyword_id FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE T1.title = 'Sin City'

question: Look for the movie title with the keyword of "angel".
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN keyword AS T3 ON T2.keyword_id = T3.keyword_id WHERE T3.keyword_name = 'angel'

question: Which keywords belong to the movie titles with the highest popularity?
query: SELECT T3.keyword_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN keyword AS T3 ON T2.keyword_id = T3.keyword_id ORDER BY T1.popularity DESC LIMIT 1

question: Provide the genre ID of the movie with the title of "The Dark Knight".
query: SELECT T2.genre_id FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Dark Knight'

question: List down the movie titles within the genre of thriller.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T3.genre_name = 'Thriller'

question: Write down five rumoured movie titles within the genre of Drama.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T1.movie_status = 'Rumored' AND T3.genre_name = 'Drama' LIMIT 5

question: What is the genre of the movie title with the lowest revenue generated?
query: SELECT T3.genre_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id ORDER BY T1.revenue LIMIT 1

question: State the genre of the movie title with a runtime of only 14 minutes.
query: SELECT T3.genre_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T1.runtime = 14

question: What is the genre of the movie title which was well-received by the audiences but made the lowest revenue?
query: SELECT T3.genre_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id ORDER BY T1.vote_average DESC, T1.revenue LIMIT 1

question: Provide the genre of a movie title with a tagline of "A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…".
query: SELECT T3.genre_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T3.genre_id = T2.genre_id WHERE T1.tagline = 'A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...'

question: What is the country ID of the movie with the title of "Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest"?
query: SELECT T2.COUNTry_id FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE T1.title LIKE 'Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man%s Chest'

question: List down the movie titles that were produced in Canada.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T3 ON T2.COUNTry_id = T3.COUNTry_id WHERE T3.COUNTry_name = 'Canada'

question: Accumulate the budget of the movie titles with the keyword of "video game".
query: SELECT SUM(T1.budget) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN keyword AS T3 ON T2.keyword_id = T3.keyword_id WHERE T3.keyword_name = 'video game'

question: For movies with the keyword of "civil war", calculate the average revenue generated by these movies.
query: SELECT AVG(T1.revenue) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN keyword AS T3 ON T2.keyword_id = T3.keyword_id WHERE T3.keyword_name = 'civil war'

question: Find out the popularity of the movies with the highest vote count.
query: SELECT popularity FROM movie ORDER BY vote_COUNT DESC LIMIT 1

question: Among the zero-budget movie titles, which one has made the highest revenue?
query: SELECT title FROM movie WHERE budget = 0 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the ID of the production company which produced the movie "Gladiator"?
query: SELECT T2.company_id FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE T1.title = 'Gladiator'

question: List down the IDs of the production companies that released the movies in 1916.
query: SELECT T2.company_id FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE CAST(STRFTIME('%Y', T1.release_date) AS INT) = 1916

question: List down the movies produced by Lucasfilm.
query: SELECT T3.title FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Lucasfilm'

question: Among Warner Bros. Pictures' movies, which title made the highest revenue?
query: SELECT T3.title FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Warner Bros. Pictures' ORDER BY T3.revenue DESC LIMIT 1

question: Write down the release date of the movies produced by Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation.
query: SELECT T3.release_date FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation'

question: What is the language ID of the movie "Walk the Line"?
query: SELECT T2.language_id FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE T1.title = 'Walk the Line'

question: Find out the language ID of the movie with the highest popularity.
query: SELECT T2.language_id FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id ORDER BY T1.popularity DESC LIMIT 1

question: Tell the language of the movie "C'era una volta il West".
query: SELECT T3.language_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id WHERE T1.title LIKE 'C%era una volta il West'

question: Are there any post-production movies in Nederlands?
query: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.movie_status = 'Post Production' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS YORN FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id WHERE T3.language_name = 'Nederlands'

question: List down the tagline of the Polski movies.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.tagline FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id WHERE T3.language_name = 'Polski'

question: Provide the homepage of the Bahasa Indonesia movies.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.homepage FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id WHERE T3.language_name = 'Bahasa indonesia'

question: Work out the difference in revenues made between the English and Latin movies.
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T3.language_name = 'English' THEN T1.revenue ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T3.language_name = 'Latin' THEN T1.revenue ELSE 0 END) AS DIFFERENCE FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id

question: Calculate the revenues made by Fantasy Films and Live Entertainment.
query: SELECT SUM(T3.revenue) FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name IN ('Fantasy Films', 'Live Entertainment')

question: What is the average revenue made by Latin movies?
query: SELECT AVG(T1.revenue) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id WHERE T3.language_name = 'Latin'

question: What is the most common first name?
query: SELECT person_name FROM person GROUP BY person_name ORDER BY COUNT(person_name) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the average number of crews for a movie?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CD) AS REAL) / COUNT(movie_id) FROM ( SELECT movie_id, COUNT(person_id) AS CD FROM movie_crew GROUP BY movie_id )

question: List all the keywords with "christmas" in them.
query: SELECT keyword_name FROM keyword WHERE keyword_name LIKE '%christmas%'

question: What is the longest runtime of all movies?
query: SELECT MAX(runtime) FROM movie

question: What is the iso code of "Kyrgyz Republic"?
query: SELECT COUNTry_iso_code FROM COUNTry WHERE COUNTry_name = 'Kyrgyz Republic'

question: Provide the overview for the movie "The Pacifier".
query: SELECT overview FROM movie WHERE title = 'The Pacifier'

question: How many movies were produced by "Eddie Murphy Productions"?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie_company AS T1 INNER JOIN production_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id WHERE T2.company_name = 'Eddie Murphy Productions'

question: List all the actors who have played characters with "captain" in their names.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.person_name FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T2.character_name LIKE '%captain%'

question: What is the most common keyword among all the movies released in 2006?
query: SELECT T3.keyword_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN keyword AS T3 ON T2.keyword_id = T3.keyword_id WHERE T1.release_date LIKE '2006%' GROUP BY T3.keyword_name ORDER BY COUNT(T3.keyword_name) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many movies have "vi" as their language code?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie_languages AS T1 INNER JOIN language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T2.language_code = 'vi'

question: What is the third least common genre?
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM movie_genres AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.genre_id GROUP BY T2.genre_id ORDER BY COUNT(T1.movie_id) LIMIT 2, 1

question: What is the original language of the movie with the tagline "An offer you can't refuse."?
query: SELECT T3.language_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id INNER JOIN language_role AS T4 ON T2.language_role_id = T4.role_id WHERE T4.language_role = 'Original' AND T1.tagline LIKE 'An offer you can%t refuse.'

question: Provide the average revenue of all the French movies.
query: SELECT AVG(T1.revenue) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T3 ON T2.COUNTry_id = T3.COUNTry_id WHERE T3.COUNTry_name = 'France'

question: List all the unspecified gender characters.
query: SELECT T1.character_name FROM movie_cast AS T1 INNER JOIN gender AS T2 ON T1.gender_id = T2.gender_id WHERE T2.gender = 'Unspecified'

question: What are the top 5 most popular movie directors?
query: SELECT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T2.job = 'Director' ORDER BY T1.popularity DESC LIMIT 5

question: List the film with the highest budget in each genre.
query: SELECT T3.genre_name, MAX(T1.budget) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id GROUP BY T3.genre_name

question: What is the title of the movie with the most keywords?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id GROUP BY T1.title ORDER BY COUNT(T2.keyword_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which department has the most people?
query: SELECT T1.department_name FROM department AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.department_id = T2.department_id GROUP BY T1.department_id ORDER BY COUNT(T2.department_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What percentage of films are made in the US?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T3.COUNTry_iso_code = 'US' THEN T1.movie_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN COUNTry AS T3 ON T2.COUNTry_id = T3.COUNTry_id

question: What is the average ratio between female and male actors in a movie?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.gender = 'Female' THEN T1.person_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.gender = 'Male' THEN T1.person_id ELSE NULL END) FROM movie_cast AS T1 INNER JOIN gender AS T2 ON T1.gender_id = T2.gender_id

question: List the movies released in 1945.
query: SELECT title FROM movie WHERE CAST(STRFTIME('%Y', release_date) AS INT) = 1945

question: Provide the ID and ISO code of Belgium.
query: SELECT COUNTry_id, COUNTry_iso_code FROM COUNTry WHERE COUNTry_name = 'Belgium'

question: List the character names played by Catherine Deneuve.
query: SELECT T2.character_name FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T1.person_name = 'Catherine Deneuve'

question: List the movies in the Somali language.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id WHERE T3.language_name = 'Somali'

question: Provide the release date and language of the most popular movie.
query: SELECT T1.release_date, T3.language_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id ORDER BY T1.popularity DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the original language of the "Four Rooms" movie?
query: SELECT T3.language_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_languages AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN language AS T3 ON T2.language_id = T3.language_id INNER JOIN language_role AS T4 ON T2.language_role_id = T4.role_id WHERE T4.language_role = 'Original' AND T1.title = 'Four Rooms'

question: List the character names in the "Open Water" movie.
query: SELECT T2.character_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id WHERE T1.title = 'Open Water'

question: Who is the main actor in the "Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End" movie?
query: SELECT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title LIKE 'Pirates of the Caribbean: At World%s End' ORDER BY T2.cast_order LIMIT 1

question: List the names of camera supervisors in the crew.
query: SELECT T1.person_name FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T2.job = 'Camera Supervisor'

question: List the job titles of Sally Menke in the crew.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.job FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T1.person_name = 'Sally Menke'

question: Provide the names and departments of the person who worked as a music editor in the "Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End" movie.
query: SELECT T3.person_name, T4.department_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id INNER JOIN department AS T4 ON T2.department_id = T4.department_id WHERE T1.title LIKE 'Pirates of the Caribbean: At World%s End' AND T2.job = 'Music Editor'

question: Provide the titles and revenues of the movies produced by the DreamWorks company.
query: SELECT T1.title, T1.revenue FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN production_company AS T3 ON T2.company_id = T3.company_id WHERE T3.company_name = 'DreamWorks'

question: How many movies were produced in Canada?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.movie_id) FROM COUNTry AS T1 INNER JOIN production_COUNTry AS T2 ON T1.COUNTry_id = T2.COUNTry_id WHERE T1.COUNTry_name = 'Canada'

question: List the genres of Forrest Gump movie.
query: SELECT T3.genre_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T1.title = 'Forrest Gump'

question: Provide the production companies of the movie that has over 35% average running time per movie in 2016.
query: SELECT T.company_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT T3.company_name, T1.runtime FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN production_company AS T3 ON T3.company_id = T2.company_id WHERE T1.release_date LIKE '2016%' ) T WHERE T.runtime * 100 > (0.35 * ( SELECT AVG(T1.runtime) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN production_company AS T3 ON T3.company_id = T2.company_id WHERE T1.release_date LIKE '2016%' ) + ( SELECT AVG(T1.runtime) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN production_company AS T3 ON T3.company_id = T2.company_id WHERE T1.release_date LIKE '2016%' )) * 100

question: Find the difference in percentage of the movies under keywords of "woman director" and "independent film".
query: SELECT CAST((SUM(CASE WHEN T1.keyword_name = 'woman director' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T1.keyword_name = 'independent film' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(CASE WHEN T1.keyword_name = 'independent film' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM keyword AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.keyword_id = T2.keyword_id

question: Which genre does the movie Dancer in the Dark belong to?
query: SELECT T3.genre_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T1.title = 'Dancer in the Dark'

question: How many adventure movies are there that were released in 2000?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T3.genre_name = 'Adventure' AND CAST(STRFTIME('%Y', T1.release_date) AS INT) = 2000

question: Which movies did the company Paramount Pictures produce in 2000?
query: SELECT T3.title FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN movie AS T3 ON T2.movie_id = T3.movie_id WHERE T1.company_name = 'Paramount Pictures' AND CAST(STRFTIME('%Y', T3.release_date) AS INT) = 2000

question: What keyword can the user use to search for the movie Finding Nemo?
query: SELECT T3.keyword_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN keyword AS T3 ON T2.keyword_id = T3.keyword_id WHERE T1.title = 'Finding Nemo'

question: Name the horror movies with positive ratings greater than 7.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id WHERE T3.genre_name = 'Horror' AND T1.vote_average > 7

question: How many production companies made more than 150 movies?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT T1.company_name AS CNAME FROM production_company AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_company AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id GROUP BY T1.company_id HAVING COUNT(T1.company_name) > 150 )

question: What is the role of Mark Hammel?
query: SELECT T2.job FROM person AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.person_id = T2.person_id WHERE T1.person_name = 'Mark Hammel'

question: How many main actors are there in the movie Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.cast_order) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN gender AS T3 ON T3.gender_id = T2.gender_id WHERE T3.gender = 'Male' OR T3.gender = 'Female' AND T1.title = 'Pirates of the Caribbean: At World''s End' AND T2.cast_order = ( SELECT MIN(T2.cast_order) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN gender AS T3 ON T3.gender_id = T2.gender_id WHERE T3.gender = 'Male' OR T3.gender = 'Female' AND T1.title = 'Pirates of the Caribbean: At World''s End' )

question: Which movies have the participation of actor Harrison Ford?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T3.person_name = 'Harrison Ford'

question: Which character did Orlando Bloom play in the movie Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl?
query: SELECT T2.character_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_cast AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title = 'Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl' AND T3.person_name = 'Orlando Bloom'

question: What is the average number of horror movies among all movies genre?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T3.genre_name = 'Horror' THEN T1.movie_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) / COUNT(T1.movie_id) FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_genres AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN genre AS T3 ON T2.genre_id = T3.genre_id

question: List the names of all the producers in the movie "Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End".
query: SELECT T3.person_name FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_crew AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN person AS T3 ON T2.person_id = T3.person_id WHERE T1.title = 'Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl' AND T2.job = 'Producer'

question: Calculate the average income made by movies using the keyword "paris". List the title of the movies.
query: SELECT AVG(T1.revenue), T1.title FROM movie AS T1 INNER JOIN movie_keywords AS T2 ON T1.movie_id = T2.movie_id INNER JOIN keyword AS T3 ON T2.keyword_id = T3.keyword_id WHERE T3.keyword_name = 'paris'
